name: Shark Snax
description:
Add your name and customize your shell, then race against the clock to eat more snacks than the obnoxious AI shark. He reacts to the outcome of the game depending on who wins!

A simple, casual minigame I made for my kids.

Made in Unity with Playmaker. All art and animation by me. (Music credit: "Peter Popoff" by mathgrant at FMA.org)
